interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Wow the Crowd Eyelash Growth Serum for Full, Luscious, Long and Thick Lashes - Natural Formula (7mL), Clinically and Dermatologist Tested - Boost and Enhance Eyelashes and Brows
Review Date: 2020/01/17
Store: K Kerotin
Average Rating: 3.5
Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '4.6 x 1.3 x 1.3 inches; 4.8 Ounces', 'UPC': '632726043414'}
Review Text: My wife has been using this product for about a week and likes it. It’s very easy to apply, just like clear liquid eyeliner. It’s good that it does not irritate my wife’s sensitive skin at all. She has tried on her lashes and has noticed a slight difference in the thickness of them. I am sure that time will bring more dramatic results. The product is a bit pricey for the amount you get though.
Review Title: Easy to apply, does not irritate.
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------

These are so nice and easy to apply. You instantly feel the moisture in your skin from the moment you put them on. After taking them off you notice that it really helps with the bags! My wife has used a few times and has already noticed a difference! They are even more refreshing when cold! Just keep them in your fridge!

My wife has been using this product for about a week and likes it. It’s very easy to apply, just like clear liquid eyeliner. It’s good that it does not irritate my wife’s sensitive skin at all. She has tried on her lashes and has noticed a slight difference in the thickness of them. I am sure that time will bring more dramatic results. The product is a bit pricey for the amount you get though.
Easy to apply, does not irritate.
profile:
**User Summary:**

The user maintains a strong preference for skin care products, focusing on effective solutions such as under-eye treatments for puffiness and dark circles. They prioritize practicality and ease of use, favoring items that deliver instant hydration and refreshing sensations. The user appreciates products that enhance sensory experiences, often highlighting the benefits of cooling items like masks. 

Recently, they demonstrated a family-centric approach to skin care by sharing positive feedback about a gentle face cleanser their wife enjoys, emphasizing its moisturizing qualities and suitability for sensitive skin. The user noted that it leaves skin feeling exceptionally soft, aligning with their overall preference for enjoyable, effective routines. They also value beautifully scented products but exhibit flexibility in exploring options that resonate with loved ones, even if those items have minimal scent.

In their latest interaction, the user expressed satisfaction with a product that enhances lash thickness, noting its ease of application and gentle formulation suitable for sensitive skin. This reflects their continued focus on family-oriented choices and skincare solutions that combine visible results with enjoyable application experiences. 

Overall, the user seeks skin care options that blend immediate benefits with sensory pleasure while showing an evolving awareness of natural and cruelty-free ingredients. Their approach underscores the importance of practical, effective routines while remaining dedicated to the skincare needs of their family.
